thread.title: Ronan Keating's pregnant wife Storm shows off baby bump at his annual Emeralds and Ivy Ball
thread.title_full: Ronan Keating's pregnant wife Storm shows off baby bump at his annual Emeralds and Ivy Ball

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Ronan Keating's pregnant wife Storm shows off baby bump at his annual Emeralds and Ivy Ball
text:
Ronan Keating's pregnant wife Storm shows off baby bump at his annual Emeralds and Ivy Ball The happy couple announced their pregnancy news in December, saying it's like having "every wish come true" Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now The couple are expecting their first child Share this video Get celebs   
Storm Keating looked beautiful last night as she showed off her blossoming baby bump at a charity fundraiser. 
The TV producer, who revealed her pregnancy in December, was by husband Ronan’s side at his annual fundraiser in aid of Cancer Research UK and the Marie Keating Foundation. 
Ronan’s beloved mother Marie died of breast cancer in 1998 and the family set up the foundation in her honour, to help prevent the disease through early diagnosis and support those affected by cancer. They were at the Emeralds and Ivy Ball (Photo: Rex Features) Storm looked incredible in her black frock (Photo: Rex Features) Read More Ronan Keating reveals he's "bursting" with excitement about becoming a dad for fourth time 
Marie never got to meet Storm, whom Ronan married in 2015, but he told Daily Mail Australia : “She would have loved her. Me mam loved life and loved people like that with a full heart and a caring heart, I know she would have loved Storm whole heartedly, perfectly.” 
Ronan and Storm led a host of celebrities at the Emeralds and Ivy Ball fundraiser, held at Battersea Evolution on Saturday night. 
Others in attendance included Imogen Thomas, Jessica Wright, Natalie Pinkham and Amy Willerton. The couple looked loved up (Photo: Rex Features) This is their first child together. Ronan is dad to three kids from his first marriage (Photo: Rex Features) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
